## Details

This is a free 8-week webinar training series on Reproducible Reporting with R (R3) for marine ecological indicators, sponsored by the Working Group on the Northwest Atlantic Regional Sea ([WGNARS](https://www.ices.dk/community/groups/Pages/WGNARS.aspx)) and open to all.
